body_html: tensorrt does have "deconvolution" layer support: https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/tensorrt-api/c_api/classnvinfer1_1_1_i_deconvolution_layer.html , which presumably should map to the "Conv2DBackpropInput" op in tensorflow.
body_text: tensorrt does have "deconvolution" layer support: https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/tensorrt-api/c_api/classnvinfer1_1_1_i_deconvolution_layer.html , which presumably should map to the "Conv2DBackpropInput" op in tensorflow.
body: tensorrt does have "deconvolution" layer support: https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/tensorrt-api/c_api/classnvinfer1_1_1_i_deconvolution_layer.html , which presumably should map to the "Conv2DBackpropInput" op in tensorflow.
